API¶

Models¶

class example.models.TestHSTORE(foo)[source]¶

SQLAlchemy model for demonstration of the postgres dialect sqlalchemy.dialects.postgresql.HSTORE field

Parameters:
  • id – standart pk.
  • foo – sqlalchemy.dialects.postgresql.HSTORE field.

Usage:

>>> hash = {'param1': 'foo', 'param2': 'bar'}
>>> hstore_obj = TestHSTORE(hash)
>>> hstore_obj.foo
{'param2': 'bar', 'param1': 'foo'}

Note

Works only with PostgreSQL database.

class example.models.TestTEXT(foo, ufoo, fooText, ufooText)[source]¶

SQLAlchemy model for demonstration work with any text type field.

Parameters:
  • id – standart pk.
  • foo – sqlalchemy.String field.
  • ufoo – sqlalchemy.Unicode field.
  • fooText – sqlalchemy.Text field.
  • ufooText – sqlalchemy.UnicodeText field.

Usage:

>>> params = ('blablabla', 'blablabla!', 'bla bla bla', 'blablabla')
>>> text_obj = TestTEXT(*params)
>>> text_obj.foo, text_obj.ufoo, text_obj.fooText, text_obj.ufooText
('blablabla', 'blablabla!', 'bla bla bla', 'blablabla')
class example.models.TestBOOL(foo)[source]¶

SQLAlchemy model for demonstration sqlalchemy.Boolean field

Parameters:
  • id – standart pk.
  • foo – sqlalchemy.Boolean field.

Usage:

>>> TestBOOL(True).foo, TestBOOL(False).foo
(True, False)
class example.models.TestDND(name, value, position1)[source]¶

SQLAlchemy model for demonstration draggable field.

Parameters:
  • id – standart pk.
  • name – sqlalchemy.Unicode field.
  • value – sqlalchemy.Integer field.
  • position1 – sqlalchemy.Integer field.
class example.models.TestUNION(name, foo, cash, double_cash)[source]¶

SQLAlchemy model for demonstration draggable field.

Parameters:
  • id – standart pk.
  • name – sqlalchemy.Unicode field.
  • foo – sqlalchemy.Boolean field.
  • double_cash – sqlalchemy.Numeric field.

Initializedb¶

example.scripts.initializedb.add_extension(engine, *args)[source]¶

Add extension to PostgreSQL database.

Note

Works only with PostgreSQL database.

example.scripts.initializedb.add_fixture(model, fixtures)[source]¶

Add fixtures to database.

Example:

hashes = ({'foo': {'foo': 'bar', '1': '2'}}, {'foo': {'test': 'data'}})
add_fixture(TestHSTORE, hashes)
